workflow.name: Optimize unstructured data for RAG with Blockify IdeaBlocks technology
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

## Blockify¬Æ Data Optimization Workflow

### Blockify Optimizes Data for RAG - Giving Structure to Unstructured Data for ~78X Accuracy, when pairing Blockify Ingest and Blockify Distill

### Learn more at [https://iternal.ai/blockify](https://iternal.ai/blockify)

#### Get Free Demo API Access here: [https://api.blockify.ai/register](https://api.blockify.ai/register)

#### Read the Technical Whitepaper here: [https://iternal.ai/blockify-results](https://iternal.ai/blockify-results)

#### See example Accuracy Comparison here: [https://iternal.ai/case-studies/medical-accuracy/](https://iternal.ai/case-studies/medical-accuracy/)

Blockify is a data optimization tool that takes messy, unstructured text, like hundreds of sales‚Äëmeeting transcripts or long proposals, and intelligently optimizes the data into small, easy‚Äëto‚Äëunderstand "IdeaBlocks." Each IdeaBlock is just a couple of sentences in length that capture one clear idea, plus a built‚Äëin contextualized question and answer.

With this approach, Blockify improves accuracy of LLMs (Large Language Models) by an average aggregate 78X, while shrinking the original mountain of text to about 2.5% of its size while keeping (and even improving) the important information.

When Blockify's IdeaBlocks are compared with the usual method of breaking text into equal‚Äësized chunks, the results are dramatic. Answers pulled from the distilled IdeaBlocks are roughly 40X more accurate, and user searches return the right information about 52% more accurate. In short, Blockify lets you store less data, spend less on computing, and still get better answers- turning huge documents into a concise, high‚Äëquality knowledge base that anyone can search quickly.

Blockify works by processing chunks of text to create structured data from an unstructured data source.

Blockify¬Æ replaces the traditional "dump‚Äëand‚Äëchunk" approach with an end‚Äëto‚Äëend pipeline that cleans and organizes content before it ever hits a vector store.

Admins first define who should see what, then the system ingests any file type‚ÄîWord, PDF, slides, images‚Äîinside public cloud, private cloud, or on‚Äëprem. A ‚Äãcontext‚Äëaware splitter finds natural breaks, and a series of specially developed Blockify LLM model turns each segment into a draft IdeaBlock.

GenAI systems fed with this curated data return sharper answers, hallucinate far less, and comply with security policies out of the box.

The result: higher trust, lower operating cost, and a clear path to enterprise‚Äëscale RAG without the cleanup headaches that stall most AI rollouts.

parameters.toolDescription: Use this knowledge base to answer questions from the user

parameters.initialMessages:
Hello! I'm an AI assistant trained on the official n8n documentation.
You can ask me anything about n8n nodes, workflows, or concepts. For example:
"How does the IF node work?"
"What is a sub-workflow?"

parameters.content:
## Collect Source Documents

Extract data and convert into text through any traditional methods so the information can be passed into the Blockify text based API.

This sample uses a simple .TXT file uploaded to Google Drive, but the content could be anything.

## Chunk Text

Chunk using any normal chunking method. For optimal results we recommend sending between 1,000 and 4,000 Character chunks per Blockify Ingest API request with a 10% Overlap.

This example uses 1,000 Characters and 100 Character Overlap.

## Blockify Ingest API
### Get your free trial API key here: https://console.blockify.ai/signup

Blockify Ingest is designed to receive input raw source (parsed / chunked) text via LLM API request and output structured optimized XML ‚ÄúIdeaBlocks,‚Äù repackaging the source data into a cleaned format. 

The process is ‚âà99% lossless for numerical data, facts, and key information. We always encourage a human to be in the loop to review the outputs of IdeaBlock content.

## Embed IdeaBlocks

### Recommend testing different elements of the XML to Embed 

How you split and load the IdeaBlocks into your Vector DB is at your discretion. For optimal result try different combinations of the XML data for each IdeaBlock.

I.e. Just embedding the Critical Question, vs Critical Question + Trusted Answer, etc. 

Remember to serve at a minimum the Critical Question and the Trusted Answer in the TEXT part of the DB entry. Some use cases benefit from the embedding text being differed from the text returned during the search.

## Basic RAG

Used to simply showcase how the IdeaBlocks can be used. IdeaBlocks could be used in place of any Chunk data source approach (RAG or otherwise).

# Blockify¬Æ Data Optimization Workflow

## Blockify Optimizes Data for RAG - Giving Structure to Unstructured Data for ~78X Accuracy, when pairing Blockify Ingest and Blockify Distill

## Learn more at [https://iternal.ai/blockify](https://iternal.ai/blockify)

### Get Free Demo API Access here: [https://console.blockify.ai/signup](https://console.blockify.ai/signup)

### Read the Technical Whitepaper here: [https://iternal.ai/blockify-results](https://iternal.ai/blockify-results)

### See example Accuracy Comparison here: [https://iternal.ai/case-studies/medical-accuracy/](https://iternal.ai/case-studies/medical-accuracy/)

Blockify is a data optimization tool that takes messy, unstructured text, like hundreds of sales‚Äëmeeting transcripts or long proposals, and intelligently optimizes the data into small, easy‚Äëto‚Äëunderstand "IdeaBlocks." Each IdeaBlock is just a couple of sentences in length that capture one clear idea, plus a built‚Äëin contextualized question and answer.

With this approach, Blockify improves accuracy of LLMs (Large Language Models) by an average aggregate 78X, while shrinking the original mountain of text to about 2.5% of its size while keeping (and even improving) the important information.

When Blockify's IdeaBlocks are compared with the usual method of breaking text into equal‚Äësized chunks, the results are dramatic. Answers pulled from the distilled IdeaBlocks are roughly 40X more accurate, and user searches return the right information about 52% more accurate. In short, Blockify lets you store less data, spend less on computing, and still get better answers- turning huge documents into a concise, high‚Äëquality knowledge base that anyone can search quickly.

Blockify works by processing chunks of text to create structured data from an unstructured data source.

Blockify¬Æ replaces the traditional "dump‚Äëand‚Äëchunk" approach with an end‚Äëto‚Äëend pipeline that cleans and organizes content before it ever hits a vector store.

Admins first define who should see what, then the system ingests any file type‚ÄîWord, PDF, slides, images‚Äîinside public cloud, private cloud, or on‚Äëprem. A ‚Äãcontext‚Äëaware splitter finds natural breaks, and a series of specially developed Blockify LLM model turns each segment into a draft IdeaBlock.

GenAI systems fed with this curated data return sharper answers, hallucinate far less, and comply with security policies out of the box.

The result: higher trust, lower operating cost, and a clear path to enterprise‚Äëscale RAG without the cleanup headaches that stall most AI rollouts.

# Step 1: Blockify Ingest
## Workflow for the Blockify Ingest Component. Does not include the Blockify Distill Component which is independent of the Ingest stage.
